_header: With busy discretion and with good will
_description: The seven works on bodily mercy, in the Speculum Christiani, tercia tabula — eight couplets

Ushaw28.First Lines:
With besy discrecion & with goude willeþu breke þi
                    brede þe hungre tille…
Ushaw28.Last Lines:
…þies ben þe werkes of mercy seuenfulfille ȝe
                    hem þat wille to heuen
Ushaw28.Note:
Each of stanzas 2-8 with heading for its work of mercy,
                        ‘Cibare’, ‘Potare’,
                        ‘Hospitare’, etc.
